title: Google adds prominent contact info for National Domestic Violence hotline in Search
content:
This week, Google announced a new change to Search that will put the information for the National Domestic Violence hotline in prominent locations.

more…

The post Google adds prominent contact info for National Domestic Violence hotline in Search appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has partnered with the National Domestic Violence hotline to make it easier to find help for those affected by domestic violence.
